data.name: Raccoon Lagoon
data.description: Hello, Island Spirit!  A group of adorable sailors have been marooned on your shore.  Let’s help them build a home here. And just maybe, they can help us repair the island’s broken heart.  Explore the eight beautiful and distinct climates of the island, and with fishing, cooking, farming, mining, painting, themed decorations, and many hours of story quests, you won’t run out of things to do.  You can invite a friend if you wish, just make sure to watch out for the Raccoons!

translations.long_description: ¡Hola, espíritu de la isla! Un grupo de adorables marineros naufragó en tu costa. Ayudémoslos a construir un hogar aquí y quizás puedan ayudarnos a reparar el corazón roto de la isla. Explora los ocho hermosos y definidos climas de la isla. Además, podrás disfrutar de la pesca, la cocina, la agricultura, la minería, la pintura, las decoraciones temáticas y de muchas horas de misiones sobre la historia, por lo que siempre tendrás cosas que hacer. Si lo deseas, puedes invitar a un amigo, ¡solo ten cuidado con los mapaches!
translations.short_description: ¡Hola, espíritu de la isla! Un grupo de adorables marineros naufragó en tu costa. Ayudémoslos a construir un hogar aquí y quizás puedan ayudarnos a reparar el corazón roto de la isla. Si lo deseas, puedes invitar a un amigo, ¡solo ten cuidado con los mapaches!

translations.long_description: 안녕하세요, 섬의 정령! 사랑스러운 선원의 무리가 해안에 줄지어 서 있습니다. 이들이 여기에 집을 짓도록 도와주세요. 어쩌면 이 선원들이 섬의 부서진 하트를 수리하는 데 도움이 될 수도 있겠네요. 이 섬의 아름답고 독특한 8대 기후를 탐험하며 낚시, 요리, 농사, 채굴, 그림 그리기, 테마 장식과 다양한 스토리 퀘스트 속에 푹 빠져 보세요. 할 거리가 무궁무진합니다. 원한다면 친구를 초대할 수 있습니다. 라쿤을 조심하는 걸 잊지 마세요!
translations.short_description: 안녕하세요, 섬의 정령! 사랑스러운 선원의 무리가 해안에 줄지어 서 있습니다. 이들이 여기에 집을 짓도록 도와주세요. 어쩌면 이 선원들이 섬의 부서진 하트를 수리하는 데 도움이 될 수도 있겠네요. 원한다면 친구를 초대할 수 있습니다. 라쿤을 조심하는 걸 잊지 마세요!

translations.long_description: Oh, mächtiger Inselgott!  Ein Häufchen knuffiger Seefahrer ist an Euren Ufern gestrandet.  Helfen wir ihnen, sich ein neues Zuhause bei uns aufzubauen! Wer weiß? Vielleicht können sie uns helfen, das gebrochene Herz der Insel zu heilen …  Acht faszinierende und einmalige Klimazonen warten darauf, erkundet zu werden.  Egal ob angeln, kochen, Landwirtschaft, Bergbau, malen oder dekorieren: Es gibt immer etwas zu tun, denn eine spannende Handlung mit jeder Menge Story-Quests sorgt für stundenlangen Spielspaß.  Wer will, kann die Insel gemeinsam mit einem Freund erkunden – aber Vorsicht vor den Waschbären!
translations.short_description: Oh, mächtiger Inselgott!  Ein Häufchen knuffiger Seefahrer ist an Euren Ufern gestrandet.  Helfen wir ihnen, sich ein neues Zuhause bei uns aufzubauen! Wer weiß? Vielleicht können sie uns helfen, das gebrochene Herz der Insel zu heilen …  Wer will, kann die Insel gemeinsam mit einem Freund erkunden – aber Vorsicht vor den Waschbären!

translations.long_description: Bonjour, Island Spirit! Un groupe d'adorables marins s'est échoué sur votre rivage. Aidons-les à bâtir une maison sur place. Ils pourront peut-être nous aider à réparer le cœur brisé de l'île. Explorez les huit différentes zones climatiques magnifiques de l'île. Avec la pêche, la cuisine, l'agriculture, l'exploitation minière, la peinture, les décorations à thème et les nombreuses heures de quêtes principales, vous ne serez jamais à court d'activités. Vous pouvez même inviter un de vos amis, mais n'oubliez pas de prendre garde aux ratons laveurs!
translations.short_description: Bonjour, Island Spirit! Un groupe d'adorables marins s'est échoué sur votre rivage. Aidons-les à bâtir une maison sur place. Ils pourront peut-être nous aider à réparer le cœur brisé de l'île. Vous pouvez même inviter un de vos amis, mais n'oubliez pas de prendre garde aux ratons laveurs!

translations.long_description: ハロー、島の住人の皆さん！かわいい船員たちが島の海岸に流れ着きました。彼らが家を建てられるように手伝ってください。そうすれば、島の傷ついた心をいやしてくれるかも。島の 8 つの美しい各エリアを探検しましょう。釣り、料理、畑仕事、採掘、塗装、テーマに沿った装飾、さらに何時間もかかる冒険ステージなど、楽しいイベントが満載。友だちを招待することもできます。ただし、アライグマにはご注意！
translations.short_description: ハロー、島の住人の皆さん！かわいい船員たちが島の海岸に流れ着きました。彼らが家を建てられるように手伝ってください。そうすれば、島の傷ついた心をいやしてくれるかも。友だちを招待することもできます。ただし、アライグマにはご注意！

changelog.change_log:
V:235238
Large save games load correctly on the Quest.
    •There had been occasions where some players with larger (15-25mb) save files would crash when trying to load those saves on Quest. The saves would often be corrupted when this crash happened.
    •We adjusted the code so those larger sizes will load correctly.
    •PLEASE NOTE: Larger save files will continue to take longer to load than smaller save files.

Under-the-hood adjustments to when islands can be joined in Multiplayer. 
    •There were a few cases where an island would show as “available to join” before it has completely loaded save data. Trying to connect to an island in that state would cause disconnection or a crash.
    •Now, islands only show up as “available to join” once all data has been completely loaded.

Multiplayer Improvements!
-It's Easier to Find your Friends! Choosing "Friends" in the Multiplayer settings will now ONLY shows portals to Oculus friends that are available.Your island will still only be visible to your  friends.
-Fixed the bug that caused visiting players to have permanently empty inventories.This would happen if there was a delay in the delivery of inventory data.
-Rock-slide walls work correctly in Multiplayer now!  
-Painted Items are Now Seen by Guests!

Fixes to Quests! Possible Spoilers Below:
-Llama Luring Quest has better "completed" trigger area.
-Polish and Fixes to Repeatable Quests.
-We found the missing Treasure Maps.
-Adjusted a few locations of Treasure Chests.
-Contents of the Treasure Chests will now be sent to the Mailbox at the next storm if it gets stuck in an unreachable place.
-Large fish can once again be caught from the pier after completing the Salt quest. 

Chests and Decorations Behave Better Now!
-If a full chest is accepted by the collection wall, the items inside are sent to the Mailbox.
-Chests will not stay/get stuck outside the walls of buildings.They will be sent to the Mailbox when the storm happens. 
-Chest and decoration items are less likely to be picked up in the storm and sent to the Mailbox.

Players with a Quest headset have the full Theremin audio experience now!
Fixed a bunch of Crashes!
